title: Dash
content:
Dash Actions Cover more distance this turn: double your movement speed. 1 turn Action

Cover more distance this turn: double your movement speed.

Dash is an Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class an Equipment

Dash Information

Cover more distance this turn: double your movement speed. 1 turn Type: Action
